english.segment1: Fire of God. Burn in me. Capture my heart again. Pull me through. Make me clean. I'm reaching for your love
english.segment2: Come carry me now. I'm crying out. For someone I can not see. Come carry me now. I'm crying
english.segment3: How I long to be broken. How I want to be near you. How my heart skips beats when. Your love accepts me as I am
english.segment4: Breathe of God. Breath on me. Hold me in your hands. Take my life. This offering. And use me where I am
english.segment5: Come carry me now. I'm crying out. For someone I can not see. Come carry me now. I'm crying
english.segment6: How I long to be broken. How I want to be near you. How my heart skips beats when. Your love accepts me as I am
english.segment7: How I long to be broken. How I want to be near you. How my heart skips beats when. Your love accepts me as I am
english.segment8: Come burn in me. Come burn in me. Come burn in me. Burn in me
